title: Imagemap Editor
description: Define clickable areas for use in profiles, etc.

noRectangle.title: No existing areas
noRectangle.description: Try creating some in the preview area

noCode.title: No code available
noCode.description: Once an image is selected and any area is present, the Imagemap code would be displayed here

dnd.entriesHint: Only one image at a time

overwrite.title: Load a new image?
overwrite.description: The current image and imagemap would be overwritten. This cannot be undone.

export.title: Export Configuration
export.description: Below is the JSON configuration for the current Imagemap. You can copy or download it for later use.

import.title: Import configuration
import.description: Select the data source and quickly restore the previous work from it.
import.overrideWarning: After the import, currently defined areas would be overwritten, and settings in the configuration would override existing ones.

check.invalidAttrInArea: 区域字段缺失或类型不正确：{{id}}
check.invalidAreaType: 不支持的区域类型：{{id}} 的类型为 {{type}}
check.areaSizeOutOfRange: 区域尺寸不可超出图像范围：对于 {{id}}，{{details}}
check.invalidImagemapAttr: One or more imagemap attributes are missing, or have wrong types
check.topLinkRequired: The first line inside the tag must be a valid link
check.invalidAreaDefinition: Formatting error on line {{line}}: Invalid area definition
check.invalidSizeDefinition: Formatting error on line {{line}}: Incorrect types for position and size

error.imageFormat: Image file format not supported or corrupted
